Replace.Text: Holy Tree Domain♩
Divine Domain: Holy Tree
Hodel
If I work harder, can I really become someone like my sister?
Arrow of Destruction

After creating a capital, you will immediately gain Okuninushi, Hoder, and two Rings of Justice, which do not require a high initial [ICON_Gold] maintenance cost. All cities are permanently loyal and will not be pressured by religions other than the Governor's civilization. +500% [ICON_Production] production when building Holy Land districts, -100% [ICON_Gold] cost to purchase Holy Land district buildings, +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith to all cells in cities that own Holy Land. Missionaries and Apostles gain +4 [ICON_Movement] movement, +2 vision range and vision through terrain and landforms, ignoring terrain and [ICON_Movement] movement penalties across rivers and enemy control zones. +5 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route, +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade capacity and a merchant after the {LOC_BUILDING_SHRINE_NAME} building is completed.
Ah, were you talking to me just now? Sorry, I was listening to music... - Hodel
Firm belief
Dislikes civilizations with low faith values
Hmm...where to start?
Huh? (Surprised)
Do you need my help?
Well...I will try my best
Is it because I didn’t do well enough?
I won't show mercy
For everyone's sake..I will definitely defeat you
Okay..I will treat them well.
No... there are too many things to do now...
Do you like...listening to music? I have something for you...
!(consternation)
Do not come near me!
Eh? Are you saying hello to me? (Takes off headphones) I'm Hodel... Please give me your advice.
Want to visit...our city?
Well, let's go check it out...
Can we exchange some information? ...maybe it will be useful
If possible, I would like you to accompany me in the future...
Your behavior has threatened me.
Okay, I was overthinking...
Can you go somewhere else...?
That...
Stop asking for information... I really don't have anything here...
Really... nothing...
You have your beliefs, I have mine, please stop doing this.
Do you still want to convince me...
Sorry...I couldn't help you guys.
It's great that you can accept...
It's great that you can accept...
It's great that you can accept...
Is it a precious thing? Never mind...
Is it a precious thing? Never mind...
Is it a precious thing? Never mind...
Without your own beliefs, you have no goals...Ah, don't take it too seriously...Just some friendly reminders
The low faith you gained made Hodel very unhappy.
Unit +15 [ICON_Gold] Gold
